paper_title: On a free Schrödinger solution studied by Barceló--Bennett--Carbery--Ruiz--Vilela
abstract: We present a free Schrödinger solution studied by Barceló--Bennett--Carbery--Ruiz--Vilela and show why it can be viewed as a sharp example for the recently discovered refined decoupling theorem.
publication_venue: To appear in a Contemporary Mathematics volume, based on a talk in a virtual AMS Special Session on Harmonic Analysis in March 2022
